title: Real UI Sound Effects Library
description: Real UI is the premium library of high-quality UI sounds for video game developers.
longDescription:
Click here to listen to the Real UI Sound Effects Library!


Draw from 327 samples, presented in both mono and stereo formats, to bring your interfaces, menus, and environments to life. From basic clicks and beeps to glossy, futuristic sounds, the Real UI sound effects library has you covered.


Create satisfying menu sounds, user input sounds, confirmation and cancellation sounds, alarms and alerts, and much more. Loop clicking sounds to create scroll wheels, use musical chimes and melodic mallets to sweeten in-game events, or fill your sci-fi environments with technological noises.


Categories include:

  • 8-bit
  • Alerts
  • Beeps
  • Buzzers
  • Chirps
  • Clicks
  • Counting
  • Electrical
  • Error
  • Futuristic
  • Miscellaneous
  • Musical
  • Telemetry
  • Typing


The game-ready audio files have been converted to 16 bit audio at 44.1kHz sample rate so that their memory footprint is acceptable for even the most lightweight mobile games.


GlowMachine Sound Design is committed to providing you the best possible SFX libraries. If you have feedback or would like to hear something particular in the next version of Real UI, drop us a line at GlowMachineSoundDesign@gmail.com.


Also, if you would like to see your project showcased on our social media platforms/website, contact us at GlowMachineSoundDesign@gmail.com.


If you are in need of bespoke sound design, weâ€™d love to work with you. Contact us at GlowMachineSoundDesign@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

Number of Audio Waves: 654

Number of Audio Cues: 654

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: Some

Minutes of audio provided: 24:06

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
